title: Comment from Gerritt and Elizabeth Baker-Smith

analysis.key_quote: PLEASE... protect the services provided by nonpartisan government employees, oppose this change making civil service jobs partisan and political, and keep protections in place to stop the politicization of our government
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan civil service and the dangers of politicization, indicating a strong stance against the rule.
